title: Seattle's Fishermen's Terminal Marks 100th Year
teaser: The port is home to vessels that fish Alaska's waters. It's the largest fleet in America and brings in half the country's catch.
contentencoded:
This year is the centennial of Fishermen’s Terminal at the Port of Seattle.

The port is home to vessels that fish Alaska’s waters. It is the largest fleet in America and brings in half the country’s catch.

From the Here & Now Contributor’s Network, Carolyn Adolph of KUOW talked to fishermen preparing their nets at the terminal for the start of the season.

  • Read more on this story via KUOW

Guest

  • Carolyn Adolph, economics reporter for KUOW. She tweetsÂ @carolynadolph.
